alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 1:24PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Owsley, southeastern Estill, northwestern Breathitt, Lee and southwestern Wolfe Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 124 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shade, or 7 miles southeast of Irvine, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Old Landing, Whynot, Patsey and Cressmont around 130 PM EDT. Greeley, Belle Point, Heidelberg, See and Caryton around 135 PM EDT. Beattyville, Mount Olive, Fixer, Proctor, Leeco, Standing Rock, White Ash and Corgleton around 140 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
